mainEntity.name: Is October a good time to visit Varanasi?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, October is an excellent time to visit Varanasi. The monsoon has ended, leaving the city clean and the weather pleasantly warm and dry. It's the beginning of the peak tourist season and the festive period, including Navratri and the build-up to Diwali.

mainEntity.name: What should I wear in Varanasi in October?

acceptedAnswer.text: For daytime, light cotton clothes like t-shirts and comfortable pants are ideal. For the cooler evenings, it's a good idea to have a light shawl or a thin jacket, especially when you are near the river.
